Class CmsSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.CmsSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.i2rd.cms.PageMetaInformation, Serializable, net.proteusframework.internet.http.Site

    public class CmsSite
extends Object
implements Serializable, com.i2rd.cms.PageMetaInformation, net.proteusframework.internet.http.Site
    Represents a site.

    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
